summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 12, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, an inmate roster assignment, and multiple official count slips, all related to the routine inmate population management and verification procedures at the facility on that date.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of the inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total count of 765 inmates verified across multiple housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document records administrative inmate counts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 12, 2019.
The total inmate count recorded was 765, verified across housing units designated B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, and Z-B.
The forms include an 'Out-Count' procedure that must be submitted 45 minutes prior to the affected count, indicating standard prison operational protocol.
One roster assignment note includes the codes 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', which may refer to a suicide watch or unassigned status for an inmate, but no specific individual is named.
The documents are purely administrative and contain no named individuals, events related to the Epstein case, or substantive narrative content.
